mapper.select: select t.id, t.username, t.password, t.nickname, t.avatar, t.email, t.mobile, t.remark, t.sort_index, t.is_enable, t.is_system, t.is_delete, t.create_user_id, t.create_time, t.last_update_user_id, t.last_update_time, t.delete_user_id, t.delete_time from system_user t where t.is_delete = ${@cn.koala.mybatis.YesNo@NO.value} and t.username = #{username}
